entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Long Running Test: PostAsyncNonDuplex_ServerCompletesResponseBodyThenResetsStreamWithNoError_SuccessAndRequestBodyCancelled #115349
  • Options validation source generator doesn't consider constructing ValidationContext with an IServiceProvider #115347
    Future
  • Test System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.TimerTests.TestTimers failing with "setCounter: actual 12 expected 13" #115346
  • Configuration-binding source generator doesn't bind Dictionary<string, Enum?> #115343
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: SVE: Rename Store() to StoreAndZip() #115338
  • Math.Clamp ArgumentException uses SR.Argument_MinMaxValue differently than Random.Next() #115337
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing extract methods #115336
  • Arm64 SVE: Remaining SVE1 API work #115331
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions on 5/2/2025 11:56:41 PM +00:00 #115340
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Principal.Windows, Version=4.1.1.0 #115326
  • Build Error: Build failure with Address Sanitizer when using clr+libs+packs.product #115324
  • Support precompiling fast type switches in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #115323
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b425314/b425314/b425314.cmd #115321
  • Test failure: profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.cmd #115319
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdateTest.TestGenericAddStaticField #115318
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: CurrencyInfo #115322
  • [Linux] X509 chains with user principal name (UPN) name constraints fail to build #87413
    10.0.0
  • Empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage on Linux #83259
    Future
  • When PublishAot=true, MsBuild's RuntimeHostConfigurationOption is not taken into account in output .runtimeconfig.json #115269
  • [API Proposal]: Add XChaCha20-Poly1305 #115329
  • ConfiguredCancelableAsyncEnumerable<T> to IAsyncEnumerable<T>? #115328
  • .NET 9 Blazor WebAssembly: Rendering exception due to recursive type definition #109931
    10.0.0
  • CommandLine & Json Config #36542
  • How to emulate Expression.This() when using CompileToMethod #28774
  • Deadlock in loader lock (CoreCLR) from background GC in XAML apps #114182
  • [mono-runtime] runtime build on mainline is taking very long time on s390x #114389
  • Math.FusedMultiplyAdd returns wrong results on systems without FMA3 support #98704
    Future
  • [mono] MONO_THREADS_SUSPEND preemptive hit asset #115185
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #62653
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix config source gen with Dictionary with nullable Enum value #115350
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Vector128.WithElement codegen regression in .NET 9.0 #115348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve startup perf by avoiding JIT when invoking well-known signatures #115345
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][jiterp] Implement i8 jiterp shuffle and simplify logic #115344
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 10.0.0
  • Share allocation helpers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #115339
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbs #115335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RuntimeAsync] ilasm/ildasm support for the MethodImpl.Async #115332
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, runtime-async
  • [Android][Testing] Run runtime and libraries tests on all supported Android API versions #115330
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with vector #115327
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Remove SLH-DSA OOM test #115341
    area-System.Security
  • Fix instance size emission in ILCompiler to handle indeterminate sizes #115293
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
  • Handle not supported name constraints on Linux #115308
    area-System.Security
  • Update MacOS signing to use PME #115342
    needs-area-label
  • Fix empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage #115192
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] improve distribute_free_regions #115023
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.17
  • [release/9.0-staging] improve distribute_free_regions #115167
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #115256
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Perf] Add build time measurements for apple mobile and android scenarios #113469
    tenet-build-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline, 10.0.0
  • Align SlhDsa API with MLKem #115290
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115257
    area-codeflow
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][metadata] Defer class init for T when initializing T[]. #115278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [clr-interp] Fix access of boxed static fields address #115198
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Make sure interpreter gc_transitions gets reset on managed exceptions. #115052
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix SLH-DSA key to use SHA-1 MAC for Windows support #115271
    area-System.Security
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #115210
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable revocation list tests for ML-DSA and SLH-DSA #115254
    area-System.Security
  • Make the dotnet/runtime official build an assetless build #115311
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2703393 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Replace use of DAMT.All in ComponentModel with a more restricted set #114126
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve Math.BigMul to fix Decimal compare perf regression #115182
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add native library network support #114523
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, os-haiku, 10.0.0
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert change to follow symlinks of dotnet host #115315
    area-Host
  • [WIP][Linux][EventPipe][UserEvents] Add user events eventpipe support #115265
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add APIs to `BlobBuilder` for customizing the underlying byte array et al. #115294
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Fix Metadata aggregator: removing cumulative sum for GUIDs heap offset #115268
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    NO-SQUASH, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Consider instruction input size when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • EH support in the interpreter #115252
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • [mono][aot] optimize aot Unsafe.BitCast for more cases #115130
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Tensor<T> select. Iteration along dimensions #113697
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] runtimeConfig via boot config #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use AssemblyLoadContext-aware caches in TypeDescriptor to support unloading of assemblies cached by TypeDescriptor #114619
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix generic interface non-virtual method vt_slot issue in build_imt_slots. #115306
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Smaller funclet prologs/epilogs (x64) #115284
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
